text: Kapena akwete wanganyao akwawanganya (ni Allah), wawalamulile mu dini yanganachisya Allah, soni lingawaga lilowe lya chilekanganyo (lyalyalongolele kala lyangapa ilagasyo yekulungwa ikaweje ku Kiyama), kungaajiilanyidwe chilikati chao, soni chisimu walupuso tachipata ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope
